name: Glowfish
description: The evil Dr. Urchin has kidnapped Coralline! It’s up to Glowfish to free his lady friend and sea pals everywhere from his clutches in this underwater platform adventure. Beware—while you scour the ocean floor in search of lost friends waiting for rescue, a host of enemies is lurking!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 512 MB Hard Disk Space: 200 MB Video Card: 128 MB DirectX®: 9.0 or higher Sound: DirectSound-compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: Fun, underwater puzzle game about a fish trying to rescue his friends from the evil Dr. Urchin. Fun gameplay and controls and amazing, beautiful visuals. A must play!
Cute, but gets rather frustrating and same-like. Uninstalled after first acheivement gained. Not that interesting to play, but the sounds the little fishies make do make me smile.
Did you like The Undergarden? Get this, it's more of the same!
Pretty good game. For a clown to play. HA HA HA HA HA. Really. If you're seven, I guess.
